|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|in|mm}} {{convert/3 |length|x|width|x|height|mm|in}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|switch}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8380M Multi-Layer Managed Switch :Controller with Embedded MIPS 4KEc @500MHz *Co-processor: Nuvoton MO516LDE to manage PoE *Flash/RAM: 32MB (SPI NOR) Flash, 128MB RAM (DDR3L) *8x Gigabit Ethernet ports *2x Gigabit SFP Slots *55W PoE budget
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_gs310tp_v1 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = realtek |subtarget = rtl838x |arch = mips_4kec |support_started_version = 22.03.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = 2 Gigabit SFP untested, PoE+ available on 8 1Gbit ports }} Please insert instructions here
